item.title: Full-Stack IoT Development with Matter at the Core
item.description: At Matterize Labs, we help smart home companies bring their ideas to life with embedded software development, Matter protocol integration, and certification support. Whether you’re starting from scratch or updating existing hardware, our team delivers reliable, scalable, and Matter-compliant solutions.

item.title: Embedded Software Development
item.description:
Smart Firmware. Built for Performance.

We create custom firmware solutions that power connected devices. From resource-constrained microcontrollers to powerful Linux-based systems, we build software optimized for performance, security, and real-world deployment.

We specialize in:

  • Embedded Linux (Yocto, Buildroot, OpenWRT)
  • FreeRTOS
  • Zephyr RTOS

Our approach ensures low power consumption, high reliability, and long-term maintainability—so your product is always ready for the future.

item.title: Matter Firmware Integration
item.description:
Certified Connectivity. Seamless User Experience.

Matter is the new standard for smart home interoperability. We integrate Matter protocol into your device firmware to ensure your product works effortlessly with Apple Home, Google Home, Amazon Alexa, and other major ecosystems.

With Matter built-in:

  • Your devices pair faster
  • Work with more ecosystems
  • Stay up to date and secure

We don’t just make your products compatible. We make them Matter-ready from day one.

item.title: Matter Certification Support
item.description:
Streamlined Testing. Fast to Market.

Getting certified by the Connectivity Standards Alliance can be complex. We simplify the process. From compliance audits to test preparation, we partner with trusted labs to ensure your product meets every requirement.

Our certification services include:

  • Pre-certification testing
  • Debugging and validation
  • Documentation and application support

We help you pass the first time—saving you time, money, and frustration.

item.title: Technology and Platform Expertise
item.description:
Trusted by Industry Leaders

We’ve built and integrated solutions using platforms and chipsets from:

  • Espressif
  • Nordic Semiconductor
  • Renesas
  • Silicon Labs
  • NXP Semiconductors

Whether you’re working with Wi-Fi, Thread, Zigbee, or BLE, our engineers speak your language and understand your hardware.

item.title: Brighter — The World’s Brightest Floor Lamp
item.description: We helped transform this lighting startup’s vision into a fully functional Matter-enabled product. From prototype to pilot, we delivered support every step of the way.

item.title: Dendo
item.description: We partnered with this Australia-based company to bring their SCM smart shade controller to market. Fully Matter-certified, ready for ecosystem integration, and optimized for ease of use.

item.title: Espressif Systems — Certified Devices
item.description: Espressif Systems is a global leader in wireless communication technologies, consistently pushing the boundaries of IoT innovation. Its portfolio of certified devices showcases a commitment to quality, security, and interoperability across a broad range of IoT solutions.

item.title: Nordic Semiconductor — Certified Devices and Ecosystem
item.description: Nordic Semiconductor is a world-leading provider of ultra-low-power wireless solutions, enabling cutting-edge connectivity across a range of IoT applications. The company’s certified devices and modules power some of the most advanced smart products on the market today.

item.title: NXP Semiconductors — Certified Devices and Solutions
item.description: NXP Semiconductors is a global leader in secure connectivity solutions for the automotive, industrial, and consumer markets. With a focus on sustainability, security, and intelligent systems, NXP enables breakthrough products that power the modern world.

item.title: Renesas Electronics Corporation — Certified Devices and Solutions
item.description: Renesas Electronics Corporation is a global leader in semiconductor solutions, empowering industries with cutting-edge microcontrollers (MCUs), system-on-chips (SoCs), analog, and power devices. Renesas’s comprehensive product portfolio supports a wide range of industries, from automotive and industrial to healthcare and consumer electronics.

item.title: Silicon Labs — Certified Devices and IoT Development Platform
item.description: Silicon Labs is a global leader in secure, intelligent wireless technology, enabling developers to bring innovative IoT solutions to market faster and more reliably. With a focus on integrated hardware, software, and ecosystem support, Silicon Labs empowers developers across smart home, industrial, healthcare, and more.

item.title: Dendo SCM Smart Shade
item.description: Built in collaboration with Dendo. Matter-certified by the Connectivity Standards Alliance. Designed for seamless smart shade automation across platforms.
